Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Apart from this cytostatic effect , temsirolimus had an antiangiogenic effect with decrease of tumor microvessel density and of VEGF expression .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Cytostatic effect |
| Antiangiogenic effect |
| Tumor microvessel density |
| VEGF expression |

Note: "Cytostatic effect" and "antiangiogenic effect" are not diseases, but rather effects that temsirolimus has on cancer cells and angiogenesis, respectively. "Tumor microvessel density" and "VEGF expression" are also not diseases, but rather factors that are related to cancer angiogenesis and are affected by temsirolimus.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| None |

The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases. The terms "cytostatic effect," "antiangiogenic effect," "tumor microvessel density," and "VEGF expression" do not refer to diseases, but rather to effects or factors related to cancer. Therefore, the table above contains no entries.
